argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmfval.n | |- N = ( norm ` W ) |
| 2 |  | nmfval.x | |- X = ( Base ` W ) |
| 3 |  | nmfval.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | nmfval.d | |- D = ( dist ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( x = A -> ( x D .0. ) = ( A D .0. ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_nmfval | |- N = ( x e. X |-> ( x D .0. ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( A D .0. ) e. _V |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. X -> ( N ` A ) = ( A D .0. ) ) |
